snippet: For Eric Eichelberger, a senior at Marist School in Atlanta, a Google search yields a trove of leads on third-party scholarships.
abstract: For Eric Eichelberger, a senior at Marist School in Atlanta, a Google search yields a trove of leads on third-party scholarships.
lead_paragraph: Well-intentioned adults only have one question for seniors: "So, where are you going to school next year?"

headline.main: 13 Applications In, a Few Responses, and Now I Wait
